item.title: 48 Hour Focaccia
item.description: Focaccia Prep time Cook Time Additional Time Total Time 20 minutes 20 minutes 1 hour 20 minutes 2 hours Ingredients Focaccia Methodology Source: source1 Ingrdients Focaccia 1 whole head garlic 5 tablespoons (75ml) extra-virgin olive oil, divided Kosher salt, for seasoning 500g all-purpose or bread flour (17 1/2 ounces; about 3 1/4 cups)
